title: UN Official John Ashe Killed the Day Before He Was to Testify Against Hillary Clinton
subtitle: Former U.N. Diplomat John Ashe did die in a June 2016 accident, but his trial was not set to begin five days later, and he wasn't testifying against Hillary Clinton.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Ex-UN Official John Ashe died suspiciously the day before he was scheduled to testify against Hillary Clinton.
